question: I am completely bald, should I buy HAR?
answer: Sorry, no. We do not recommend HAR to those who are completely bald. In addition, HAR may not work for people with advanced hair loss - Norwood scale 7 or Ludwig scale Advanced (basically very few hairs left on the scalp). If you are not sure where you fall on the scale, get a free sample and test it.

question: Will HAR help grow my hair?
answer: No. HAR does not help grow your hair. It is a revolutionary hair thickening product that conceals thinning area, it works instantly.

question: Can others tell that I am using HAR?
answer:
No. Your hair will look completely natural, undetectable, even from close up, outdoor and under bright light.
 HAR is not the typical hair loss products (paint-like or shoe polish-like) you see on the market that were invented in the 80s of last century. HAR is a new, breakthrough product that quickly became a staple among professionals in theatrical and movie industries.
 Professionals love HAR because it is HD-movie-camera-proof: high definition cinematic camera can capture the smallest pores and finest wrinkles on an actor/actress's face, however it cannot tell natural hair from hair enhanced with HAR, neither can human eyes.

question: Will HAR fall out?
answer: No. Once applied, HAR will stay in place by adhering to your hair. HAR bonds to your hair 200% more securely than any other fiber based thickening products on the market. It withstands wind, sweat and rain way better than imitations.

question: Is HAR resistant to wind, rain & perspiration?
answer: Yes. The bonding force between HAR and your hair is so strong that it withstands gusty wind, light rain and sweat.
